00028 FXDEFMAP(RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel) ConnectionPanelMap[]={
00029   //____Message_Type_____________ID_______________Message_Handler_______
00030   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::ID_NYI, RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::onNotYetImplemented),
00031   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::ID_BTN_REFRESH, RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::onRefreshClicked),
00032   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::ID_BTN_CONNECT, RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::onConnectClicked),
00033   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::ID_TABLE, RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::onTableSelectionChange),
00034 
00035 };

00037 FXIMPLEMENT(RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel,FXPacker,ConnectionPanelMap,ARRAYNUMBER(ConnectionPanelMap));

00050 RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::
00051 ConnectionPanel(FXComposite *parent,FXuint opts, FXObject* sender, FXuint id)
00052   :FXPacker(parent, opts)
00053 {
00054   this->sender=sender;
00055   this->messageId=id;
00056 
00057   selServer="";
00058   serverList=new xmlServerList();
00059 
00060   FXVerticalFrame *root = new FXVerticalFrame(this,
00061              LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00062 
00063   // The help label
00064   FXString lab="Select and flood a registered server. "
00065     "For security reason, the selected server must accept "
00066     "flooder connections.";
00067   FXLabel* labAdminName=new FXLabel(root, lab);
00068 
00069   // The buttons frame
00070   FXHorizontalFrame *frButtons = new FXHorizontalFrame(root,
00071              LAYOUT_FILL_X|PACK_UNIFORM_WIDTH);
00072   FXButton* btnRefresh=new FXButton(frButtons, "Refresh", NULL, this, 
00073                                     ID_BTN_REFRESH);
00074 
00075   btnConnect=new FXButton(frButtons, "Connect", NULL, this, 
00076                                     ID_BTN_CONNECT);
00077   btnConnect->disable();
00078 
00079   // frame containing the servers' table
00080   FXHorizontalFrame *hframe = new FXHorizontalFrame(root,
00081              LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00082 
00083   FXVerticalFrame *frame = new FXVerticalFrame(hframe,
00084              LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00085 
00086   FXint tableOpt=LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y|TABLE_COL_SIZABLE;
00087   tableOpt+=TABLE_NO_COLSELECT|TABLE_ROW_RENUMBER|TABLE_READONLY;
00088 
00089   table=new FXTable(frame, this, ID_TABLE, tableOpt);
00090 
00091   // Initialize the panel
00092   createTableHeader();
00093   feedTable();
00094 }

00100   delete btnConnect;

00125 onNotYetImplemented(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){

00137 void RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::feedTable(){
00138   LOGI("Starting feedTable");
00139   tServerList* pl=serverList->getServerList();
00140   if (pl){
00141     // Feeding ^^
00142     tServerList::const_iterator iter;
00143     for (iter=pl->begin(); iter != pl->end(); iter++){
00144       this->addServer((*iter));
00145     }
00146 
00147     pl=NULL;
00148     LOGI("feedTable complete");
00149   }
00150   else{
00151     LOGE("Cannot get a valid account list");
00152   }
00153 }
00154 
00160 void RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::
00161 addServer(RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::tServerListItem* p){
00162   FXString s;
00163 
00164   FXint num=table->getNumRows();
00165 
00166   // Adds a new row at the end of the table
00167   table->insertRows(num, 1);
00168 
00169   std::ostringstream temp ;
00170   temp << num+1;
00171 
00172   // Set the row header
00173   table->getRowHeader()->setItemText(num, temp.str().c_str());
00174   table->getRowHeader()->setItemJustify(num, FXHeaderItem::RIGHT);
00175 
00176   // Sets the name
00177   FXTableItem* item=new FXTableItem(p->name);
00178   table->setItem(num, 0, item);
00179   item->setJustify(FXTableItem::LEFT);
00180 
00181   // Sets the derscription
00182   std::string d=StringConv::getSingleton().xmlStripNewLine(p->description);
00183   FXTableItem* item2=new FXTableItem(d.c_str());
00184   table->setItem(num, 1, item2);
00185   item2->setJustify(FXTableItem::LEFT);
00186 }

00194 void RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::createTableHeader(){
00195   table->insertColumns(0, 2);
00196   table->getColumnHeader()->setItemText(0, "Name");
00197   table->getColumnHeader()->setItemText(1, "Description");
00198   table->getRowHeader()->setWidth(40);
00199   table->setColumnWidth(1, 500);
00200   table->setColumnJustify(0, FXHeaderItem::LEFT);
00201   table->setColumnJustify(1, FXHeaderItem::LEFT);
00202 }

00214 long RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::
00215 onRefreshClicked(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00216   LOGI("Refresh button clicked");
00217   serverList->refresh();
00218   table->clearItems();
00219   btnConnect->disable();
00220   createTableHeader();
00221   feedTable();
00222   return 1;
00223 }
00224 
00235 FXString RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::getSelectedServerName(){
00236   FXint selRow=table->getSelStartRow();
00237 
00238   // selRow is -1 if no row selected
00239   if (selRow==-1){
00240     return "";
00241   }
00242   else{
00243     FXString s=table->getItem(selRow, 0)->getText();
00244     return s;
00245   }
00246 }
00247 
00258 long RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::
00259 onTableSelectionChange(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00260   FXint selRow=table->getSelStartRow();
00261   table->selectRow(selRow);
00262 
00263   selServer=getSelectedServerName();
00264   std::string name(selServer.text());
00265   LOGCATS("Selected server name : '");
00266   LOGCATS(name.c_str());
00267   LOGCATS("'");
00268   LOGCAT();
00269 
00270   if (selServer.empty()){
00271     
00272     btnConnect->disable();
00273   }
00274   else{
00275     btnConnect->enable();
00276   }
00277   return 1;
00278 }
00279 
00290 long RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::
00291 onConnectClicked(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00292   LOGI("Connect button clicked");
00293   std::string name(selServer.text());
00294   tServerListItem *server=serverList->getServerByName (name.c_str());
00295 
00296   if (!server){
00297     LOGW("Cannot get server informations");
00298   }
00299   else{
00300 
00301     std::string techNote(server->techNote);
00302     bool empty=(techNote.size()==0);
00303     if (empty){
00304       LOGI("Server technote is empty");
00305       changeToWaitingPanel(server);
00306     }
00307     else{
00308 
00309       std::string s=StringConv::getSingleton().xmlToNewLine(techNote);
00310 
00311 
00312       LOGI("Server technote is not empty");
00313       s+="\n\nContinue connection?";
00314       FXuint resp=FX::FXMessageBox::question(this, FX::MBOX_OK_CANCEL ,
00315                 "Server's technical note", s.c_str());
00316 
00317       // Ok to change to WaitingPanel
00318       if (resp==FX::MBOX_CLICKED_OK){
00319         changeToWaitingPanel(server);
00320       }
00321 
00322     }
00323 
00324   }
00325   return 1;
00326 }
00327 
00335 void RainbruRPG::Gui::ConnectionPanel::
00336 changeToWaitingPanel(tServerListItem* s){
00337 
00338   LOGI("Sending ID_SHOW_WAITING_PANEL signal");
00339 
00340   if (sender){
00341     sender->handle(this,FXSEL(SEL_COMMAND,messageId), s);
00342   }
00343   else{
00344     LOGW("Sender is NULL, cannot send messages");
00345   }
00346 }
